Three-point charter of Korea's reunification supported abroad 
    Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Raimundo Careaga, vice-chairman of the national executive committee of the February Revolutionary Party of Paraguay, signed the signature paper on behalf of his party on July 25 to support the three-point charter of Korea's reunification.
